feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.43.1 SSO bug fixes
entry.content:
Quick bug fix for SSO

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • OAuth 2 redirectUri hotfix by @DarioGii in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3066

Minor Enhancements

  • Remove book by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3065

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.43.0...v0.43.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.43.2 Compression fixes and more
entry.content:
• HTML to PDF now supports webforms to pdf forms
  • Survey prompt now includes the option to book a meeting with us!
  • Search function improved for wider searches
  • PDF compression fixes

If you‚Äôre using Stirling PDF at work, we‚Äôd love to speak to you. we‚Äôre offering free technical support session in exchange for a 15 minute user discovery session. This is a chance to: üõ†Ô∏è Get help with deployment, integrations, or troubleshooting üì¢ Provide direct feedback on performance, edge cases, and feature gaps üîç Help us refine Stirling PDF for real-world enterprise use If you‚Äôre interested, you can book time with our team directly. Looking forward to digging into your use cases and making Stirling PDF even better! https://calendly.com/d/cm4p-zz5-yy8/stirling-pdf-15-minute-group-discussion

What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Improve Case-Insensitive Key Comparison and Path Normalization in Language Properties Check Script by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3067
  • Weasyprint forms #3077 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3084

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3070
  • Remove convertBookTypeToPdf and Improve File Sanitization in FileToPdf by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3072
  • Update survey version cache by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3071
  • Add description to search. Fix homepage broken by ) by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3079
  • Remove book site and translation entries by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3078
  • Compression fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3081
  • Survey to allow booking meetings1 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3095

Docker Updates

  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 5.6.1 to 5.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3094
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 3.9.0 to 3.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3093
  • Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 3.4.0 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3092
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.14.0 to 6.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3091

Translation Changes

  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3080
  • lang: update fr_FR by @NicolasFR in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3074
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3086

Other Changes

  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-core from 1.5.16 to 1.5.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3068
  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-classic from 1.5.16 to 1.5.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3069
  • Bump actions/download-artifact from 4.1.8 to 4.1.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3090
  • chore: migrate vscode settings to editorconfig when possible by @M0NsTeRRR in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3088
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3085

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.43.1...v0.43.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.44.0 Memory usage enhancements, highlighter and more!
entry.content:
With this update we bring another possible fix to the 90% load issue for windows users along with multiple big fixes for various tools Huge memory usage improvements for reading large sized PDFs (50MB+) and various other tools!

We also ask users to please migrate their docker URL to our proxy URL to avoid issuers during any package migrations Please change stirlingtools/stirling-pdf (or frooodle/stirling-pdf) to docker.stirlingpdf.com/stirlingtools/stirling-pdf An example for a docker compose could be image: docker.stirlingpdf.com/stirlingtools/stirling-pdf:latest-fat

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • fix desktop client stuck at 90% by @johnmalek312 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3111
  • Fix error banner not getting removed on correct upload by @Karlkorv in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3114
  • Fix auto resizing images in view-pdf by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3121

Enhancements

  • 2926 bug undo feature of multitool delete your upload file by @ConnorYoh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3101
  • Memory enhancements and PDF decompress API by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3129
  • Add highlighter tool to View-pdf by @ryantang247 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3113

Minor Enhancements

  • ü§ñ format everything with pre-commit by by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3103

Docker Updates

  • Devcontainer by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3097
  • Fix: Devcontainer permission by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3102
  • Update download-security-jar.sh downloadURL by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3126

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3099
  • translated newly added strings re business & user interaction by @swanemar in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3116
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3124
  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3127

Other Changes

  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3100
  • Bump actions/create-github-app-token from 1.11.5 to 1.11.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3109
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3135

New Contributors

  • @johnmalek312 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3111
  • @ryantang247 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3113
  • @Karlkorv made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.43.2...v0.44.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.44.1 Zip Support, more memory enhancements, bug fixes
entry.content:
Quick release for a important bug fix on issue which caused some files to remain on server after the transition (0.44.0 only) and nice Zip file support within the browser to auto-extract required files from Zips!

Further reminder, We also ask users to please migrate their docker URL to our proxy URL to avoid issuers during any package migrations Please change stirlingtools/stirling-pdf (or frooodle/stirling-pdf) to docker.stirlingpdf.com/stirlingtools/stirling-pdf An example for a docker compose could be image: docker.stirlingpdf.com/stirlingtools/stirling-pdf:latest-fat

What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Add zip by @ryantang247 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3075
  • New Claim Attributes mail & uid by @DarioGii in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3154
  • Add unit test for FileInfo.getFormattedFileSize by @jaivra in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3132

Minor Enhancements

  • removal of all getByte loads by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3153

Docker Updates

  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3149

Translation Changes

  • issue #3137 completed by @Angel-Ozz in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3151
  • Update and improve zh_TW Traditional Chinese locale by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3141
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @mjbohn in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3140
  • Update Catalan translations by @leo-jmateo in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3134

Other Changes

  • Add Devtools labels and update labeler configuration by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3148
  • Update VS Code extensions: Remove unnecessary Java tools and add new tools like EditorConfig, Docker and GitHub extensions. by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3147
  • Update pre-commit hooks to latest versions by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3146
  • Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 7.0.7 to 7.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3145
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.10 to 3.28.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3144
  • Fix: wrong credentials for Dockerfile.dev by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3155
  • Change Labeler configuration: Replace Dockerfile.* with Dockerfile.fat and Dockerfile.ultra-lite by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3156

New Contributors

  • @Angel-Ozz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3151
  • @jaivra made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3132

üì• Downloads

üñ•Ô∏è Server Downloads

  • Stirling-PDF.jar - Standard server JAR
  • Stirling-PDF-with-login.jar - Server JAR with login functionality
  • Windows Portable Server - No installation required
  • Windows Portable Server with Login - No installation, includes login functionality

üß© Local UI Downloads

  • Windows Client Installer - Single-user Windows client
  • Mac Client Installer - Single-user Mac client

All downloads are for version 0.44.1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.44.0...v0.44.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.44.2 PDF Compression fix and more
entry.content:
This release is mostly a hotfix for compress PDF enhancements! Other changes include undo/redo for signature writing!

Along with this release we are including a tracking pixel, please note this doesn't contain any PII (Personal Info) and is fully GDPR compliant, please reach out if you have any concerns

What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Add: unoserver and more by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3108
  • Implemented undo and redo mechanism for drawing signature by @ryantang247 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3152
  • Add: Validation for rotation angle and create unit tests for RotationController by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3162

Minor Enhancements

  • Rename CustomPDDocumentFactory to CustomPDFDocumentFactory across multiple controllers by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3163
  • Fix: string comparison and formatting inconsistencies in CompressController by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3168
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3173
  • Further compression fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3177

Docker Updates

  • Bump gradle from 8.12-jdk21 to 8.13-jdk21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3158

Translation Changes

  • Ukrainian translation has been improved by @riv-gh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3161
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3166

Other Changes

  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3157
  • Refactor test imports by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3170
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.14.4 to 1.14.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3159
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3165
  • Update springdoc plugin to 1.9.0 & Improve SwaggerHub Configuration and Gradle Setup by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3175

New Contributors

  • @riv-gh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.44.1...v0.44.2

üì• Downloads

üñ•Ô∏è Server Downloads

  • Stirling-PDF.jar - Standard server JAR
  • Stirling-PDF-with-login.jar - Server JAR with login functionality
  • Windows Portable Server - No installation required
  • Windows Portable Server with Login - No installation, includes login functionality

üß© Local UI Downloads

  • Windows Client Installer - Single-user Windows client
  • Mac Client Installer - Single-user Mac client
